languages.text: In {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} combat any target surrounded by more allies than enemies receives a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for each additional ally. Larger creatures need to be surrounded by more than two enemies to provide this advantage to the attackers.

traits.locale_text: In melee combat any target surrounded by more allies then enemies receives a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for each additional ally. Larger creatures need to be surrounded by more than two enemies to provide this advantage to the attackers.

In {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} combat any target surrounded by more allies than enemies receives a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for each additional ally. Larger creatures need to be surrounded by more than two enemies to provide this advantage to the attackers.

In {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} combat any target surrounded by more allies than enemies receives a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for each additional ally. Larger creatures need to be surrounded by more than two enemies to provide this advantage to the attackers.

languages.text: Im {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g} erhält jedes Ziel, das von mehr Verbündeten als Feinden umgeben ist, einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} für jeden zusätzlichen Verbündeten. Größere Kreaturen müssen von mehr als zwei Feinden umgeben sein, um Angreifern diesen Vorteil zu gewähren.
languages.original_text: In {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} combat any target surrounded by more allies than enemies receives a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for each additional ally. Larger creatures need to be surrounded by more than two enemies to provide this advantage to the attackers.

traits.locale_text: Im Nahkampf erhält jedes Ziel, das von mehr Verbündeten als Feinden umgeben ist, einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WF{/g} für jeden zusätzlichen Verbündeten. Größere Kreaturen müssen von mehr als zwei Feinden umgeben sein, um Angreifern diesen Vorteil bereitzustellen.

languages.text: Lors d'un combat de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}, toute cible entourée de plus d'alliés que d'ennemis reçoit un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g} de +10 par allié supplémentaire. Les créatures de grande taille doivent être entourées de plus de deux ennemis pour conférer cet avantage aux attaquants.
languages.original_text: In {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} combat any target surrounded by more allies than enemies receives a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for each additional ally. Larger creatures need to be surrounded by more than two enemies to provide this advantage to the attackers.

traits.locale_text: Lors d'un combat de mêlée, toute cible entourée de plus d'alliés que d'ennemis reçoit un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}VOL{/g} de +10 par allié supplémentaire. Les créatures de grande taille doivent être entourées de plus de deux ennemis pour offrir cet avantage aux attaquants.

languages.text: 在{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}时，若此角色身边盟友数量多于敌人数量，则每多一名盟友，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}都会提高10点。攻击大型生物时，身边盟友的数量必须比敌人至少多出两名，才能触发近战优势。
languages.original_text: In {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} combat any target surrounded by more allies than enemies receives a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for each additional ally. Larger creatures need to be surrounded by more than two enemies to provide this advantage to the attackers.

traits.locale_text: 在{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}时，若此角色身边盟友数量多于敌人数量，则每多一名盟友，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}都会提高10点。攻击大型生物时，身边盟友的数量必须比敌人至少多出两名，才能触发近战优势。
在{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}时，若此角色身边盟友数量多于敌人数量，则每多一名盟友，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}都会提高10点。攻击大型生物时，身边盟友的数量必须比敌人至少多出两名，才能触发近战优势。

languages.text: En combate {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, cualquier objetivo rodeado por más aliados que enemigos recibe una {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}bonificación{/g} +10 a su {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Habilidad de armas{/g} por cada aliado adicional. Para las criaturas más grandes, es necesario rodearlas con más de dos enemigos para que los atacantes reciban la bonificación.
languages.original_text: In {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} combat any target surrounded by more allies than enemies receives a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for each additional ally. Larger creatures need to be surrounded by more than two enemies to provide this advantage to the attackers.

traits.locale_text: En combate cuerpo a cuerpo, cualquier objetivo rodeado por más aliados que enemigos recibe una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} +10 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}HA{/g} por cada aliado adicional. Para las criaturas más grandes, es necesario rodearlas con más de dos enemigos para que los atacantes reciban la bonificación.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}戦闘において、敵よりも多くの味方に囲まれているターゲットは、味方が1人増えるごとに+10の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。大型の生物の場合、2体敵以上の敵に囲まれていないと、攻撃側にはこのアドバンテージを得るにはできない。
languages.original_text: In {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} combat any target surrounded by more allies than enemies receives a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for each additional ally. Larger creatures need to be surrounded by more than two enemies to provide this advantage to the attackers.

traits.locale_text: 近接戦闘において、敵よりも多くの味方に囲まれているターゲットは、味方が1人増えるごとに+10の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。大型の生物の場合、2体以上の敵に囲まれていないと、攻撃側はこのアドバンテージを得ることはできない。

languages.text: Когда в ближнем бою рядом с целью больше союзников, чем противников, цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} за каждую единицу разности между числом союзников и противников. Для получения превосходства при атаке крупного существа нужно, чтобы его окружило более 2 противников.
languages.original_text: In {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} combat any target surrounded by more allies than enemies receives a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for each additional ally. Larger creatures need to be surrounded by more than two enemies to provide this advantage to the attackers.

traits.locale_text: Когда в ближнем бою рядом с целью больше союзников, чем противников, цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} за каждую единицу разности между числом союзников и противников. Для получения превосходства при атаке крупного существа нужно, чтобы его окружило более 2 противников.

Когда в ближнем бою рядом с целью больше союзников, чем противников, цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} за каждую единицу разности между числом союзников и противников. Для получения превосходства при атаке крупного существа нужно, чтобы его окружило более 2 противников.
